Class ThreeDimShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
      • ThreeDimShape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cube, Pyramid, Sphere

    public class ThreeDimShape
extends Shape
    Class for three dimensional shapes. Directly inherits from Shape
